name: Bountiful Harvests
title: Leading Crop and Food Production
description: Senegal's crop production index reached 189.93 in 2022, while the food production index was 177.49, showcasing significant agricultural growth since 2014-2016.

name: Aid Anomaly
title: Negative Aid Flow from Slovenia
description: In 2020, Senegal experienced a negative net bilateral aid flow of -$140,000 from Slovenia, indicating a financial outflow rather than support.

name: Girls Rule the School
title: Gender Parity in Education
description: In 2021, Senegal achieved a gender parity index of 1.164 in primary and 1.176 in primary and secondary school enrollments, highlighting a higher enrollment of girls compared to boys.

name: Female Majority
title: More Girls in Primary Education
description: As of 2018, 52.52% of primary education pupils in Senegal were female, indicating a female majority in early education.

name: Decision Dilemma
title: Limited Female Decision-Making Power
description: In 2019, only 10.2% of Senegalese women aged 15-49 participated in key household decisions, highlighting a significant gender disparity in decision-making power.
